Text.Page:
Killian has sort of a weird fetish for torturing people. It turns my stomach, but facts are facts.

The bodies of his victims are lying all around here. I would like to pray over their belongings and put them to rest, but I can't possibly collect all the necklaces myself.

Can you help me gather them up?

Oh, thank you. It was breaking my heart that I couldn't do more for them.

Even now, I can't do much...but I can do something.

Sometimes that's all you can hope for.
Please...the victims are everywhere, and it hurts my soul to think that I can't do anything more for them.
